summary: I just saw Captain Marvel.  IT WAS AMAZING WELL DONE MARVEL.   How long do i have to wait to talk about it ?   Because i really...
body:
I just saw Captain Marvel.


IT WAS AMAZING WELL DONE MARVEL.


How long do i have to wait to talk about it ?


Because i really wanna talk about it.

summary:
OK IM JUST GONNA SUM UP ALL MY CAPTAIN MARVEL THOUGHTS IN ONE POST BECAUSE BOY ARE THERE A LOT
Holy shit!!! Brie was...
body:
OK IM JUST GONNA SUM UP ALL MY CAPTAIN MARVEL THOUGHTS IN ONE POST BECAUSE BOY ARE THERE A LOT

  • Holy shit!!! Brie was amazing!!!!!!!!!!! I’m!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  • THE STAN LEE INTRO
  • Maria and Carol are girlfriends and that’s final like there’s no other way to read it. They’re dating. The end
  • Jude Law was amazing!! Obviously but DAMN he really got me to hate his character which I didn’t think was possible
  • THE FUCKVKGNF TESSERACT
  • ARE YOU KIDDING ME IS THAT REALLY HOW FURY LOST HIS EYE IM SHITTING MY PANTS
  • Also I LOVE how Carol wasn’t sexualised at all???? Other than two dudes making nasty comments everything abt her was just so?????? not sexy????????? Just completely natural
  • Carol’s HAIR!!!! It was always so messy!!!!! She didn’t wear any makeup!!!!!!!! I’m in love!!!!!!!!!!
  • Also the Skrull man (Talos) remind me a lot of the one armed dude from aou/black panther except he’s actually nice
  • I loved the Skrulls ???? They’re so nice?????? Esp Talos wow im
  • THE FUCKGJGDING MIDCREDIT SCENE OH MY GODDDDDDDD
  • I’M JUST GONNA MAKE A SEPARATE POST BC OH GEEZ
  • Feel free to add, I’m sure I’ll add some myself because mother of SHIT THIS WAS A GOOD MOVIE

summary: I just got back from the movie and I am SHAKING. Now, not sleeping for a day or two will do that to you, but my god I will not...
body:
I just got back from the movie and I am SHAKING. Now, not sleeping for a day or two will do that to you, but my god I will not be able to get this movie out of my head for a long, long while. 

It was so much more connected to the MCU than expected, they really did a good job keeping certain elements secret. Not that I was surprised by it, but my jaw dropped in recognition more than once. My mind is blown. Such a powerful message, and those two hours flew by. I seriously thought we were halfway when the credits started rolling. Now I just keep saying wow to myself, remembering every little detail. I gotta watch this one more time, as soon as possible!

summary: From Build-A-Bear to Adidas, shop the best 'Captain Marvel' merchandise now
title: From Build-A-Bear to Adidas, shop the best 'Captain Marvel' merchandise now
body:
Captain Marvel invades theaters this weekend, welcoming audiences back to the Marvel Cinematic Universe for the first time since last summer’s Ant-Man and the Wasp. But the first female-fronted Marvel Studios blockbuster isn’t just a theatrical experience. You can bring Captain Marvel, as well as her various friends and foes, home with you via a wealth of Marvel-ous merchandise. Here’s Yahoo Entertainment’s official Captain Marvel shopping guide.

Captain Marvel Bear and Goose

Get stuffed with the latest addition to Build-A-Bear’s line of Marvel-themed stuffed Teddys. The Captain Marvel bear comes in a dashing red, and is accompanied by outfits ranging from her red-and-blue superhero suit to a brown aviator jacket. If you’re more of a cat person than a bear person, pick up Carol’s feline friend, Goose, who comes pre-stuffed.

Shop it: Captain Marvel Bear, $25.50; Goose, $12.50; Captain Marvel Bear Gift Set (w/outfits), $51, Build-A-Bear

Captain Marvel Photon Power FX Glove


You’ll get a real charge out of this stylish glove, which offers all the sounds of Captain Marvel’s photon blasts, with none of their destructive fury. Just imagine how fearsome you’ll be with a the Photon Power glove in one hand, and a Hulk Hand in the other.

Shop it: $15.88, Amazon, Target and Walmart

Her Universe Marvel Captain Marvel Star Girls Faux Leather Jacket and Our Universe Marvel Captain Marvel Womens Windbreaker

Of course, Ashley Eckstein’s geek-friendly fashion line would get in on the Captain Marvel fun! The Clone Wars star modeled her leather jacket version of Carol Danvers’s uniform for us at Comic-Con last year, and now you can bring it home for yourself. If you want something a little lighter than leather, Our Universe’s zip-up windbreaker will leave you floating on air.

Shop it: Leather jacket, $79.90-84.90, Hot Topic; Windbreaker, $58.90, Box Lunch

3 Pair Marvel Comics Captain Marvel Enamel Earring Set

Gals and guys alike will up their pierced-ear game with this set of three different pairs of Captain Marvel-inspired earrings, available in simple starbursts or blazing red medallion. You’ll find these earrings, along with other Captain Marvel merch on Ebay’s Superheroine HQ destination.

Shop it: $12.99 each, Ebay

Captain Marvel Helmet

As the capper to your Captain Marvel ensemble, order one of these custom helmets from the Russian company, LumiMasks. It’s made out of liquid plastic and acrylic paint and fits folks with a 21-inch noggin.

Shop it: $120, Etsy

Captain Marvel: The Art of the Movie and Captain Marvel: Vol. 1

Captain Marvel started as a comic book, so you’ll want to flip through The Art of the Movie‘s copious collection of pre-production concept art that translated the imagery from the page to the screen. And while there have been many (maybe too many) Captain Marvel comics published over the years, you really only need to start with Kelly Sue DeConnick reboot, which placed Carol Danvers in the pilot’s seat as Marvel’s reigning Captain.

Shop it: The Art of the Movie, $39-45, Amazon and Barnes & Noble; Captain Marvel: Vol. 1, $17.99, Amazon and Barnes & Noble

Captain Marvel Comforter and Captain Marvel Reversible Sequin Pillow

Make sure you get a super-sleep with this microfiber comforter, which is a perfect fit for twin beds. And lay your weary head down on a nifty sequin pillow, that can switch from red to blue and back again with a simple wave of your hand.

Shop it: Comforter, $39.95, Shop Disney; Sequin pillow, $19.95, Shop Disney

Nick Fury and Talos 6″ Figures

There’s more to Captain Marvel than Captain Marvel. Samuel L. Jackson scores his most screentime as Nick Fury yet… and he gets to have two eyes this time! Ben Mendelsohn also steals numerous scenes as Talos, the shape-shifting Skrull, who turns out to be anything but your average Marvel bad guy.

Shop it: $19.99, Amazon and Walmart

Captain Marvel Blockbuster Video Pin

How ’90s is Captain Marvel? So ’90s that an entire scene takes place in a Blockbuster Video store. Pledge your allegiance to that decade — and that long-vanished retail giant — with this simple pin. Just be prepared for anyone under the age of 20 to ask you what a VHS tape is.

Shop it: $10, Etsy

Captain Marvel: Higher, Further, Faster

Liza Palmer’s YA novel is brought to life via the power of audiobooks. Learn what life was like for Carol Danvers and her best friend, Monica Rambeau, as Air Force cadets in the early ’80s… before Carol took a trip to the stars.

Shop it: $25.20, Audible

Adidas x Captain Marvel

This Friday 3/8 👟🌟 #HigherFurtherFaster Limited Edition #CaptainMarvel Adidas AM4s designed by me, available exclusively at Foot Locker Flagship Stores & https://t.co/EifShUG9h8. Unisex sizing. International shipping available (with some limitations—please check ahead of time) pic.twitter.com/mb9Lsv5zLi

— Jen Bartel (@heyjenbartel) March 6, 2019

Marvel artist Jen Bartel partnered with Adidas for these awesome red, blue and gold Captain Marvel kicks. These Adidas AM4’s super-stylish, while also making you feel super-heroic.
Shop it: $150, Foot Locker

Dole’s “Powering the Hero Within” Campaign

Even superheroes need healthy food options. That’s the idea behind Dole’s “Powering the Hero Within” campaign, which will splash Captain Marvel’s face across its bananas and pineapples in grocery stores. And if you log onto Dole’s official website, you can find energizing recipes like Wake Up Oats and Berried Treasure Yogurt Cups.
Shop it: Dole

The Fonz Lunchbox

Aaaayyy! It’s truly happy days when Carol is able to keep the all-important Tesseract out of Kree hands by hiding it in her Fonz lunchbox. Play keep away with your own special keepsakes with Entertainment Earth’s reproduction of this vintage tin tote. Or, you know, just stash snacks in it for between-battle nibbles.
Shop it: $14.99, Entertainment Earth

Captain Marvel opens in theaters everywhere March 8. For showtime and ticket information, visit Fandango.


Read more from Yahoo Entertainment:

  • Brie Larson on what it means to be Captain Marvel: ‘I found a level of strength that I didn’t know I had’
  • Samuel L. Jackson thinks de-aged ‘Captain Marvel’ character is based on this old movie of his
  • Brie Larson on the ‘Captain Marvel’ smiling controversy — and why it’s so demeaning to women

Yahoo Entertainment may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

  • Brie Larson on what it means to be Captain Marvel: ‘I found a level of strength that I didn’t know I had’
  • Samuel L. Jackson thinks de-aged ‘Captain Marvel’ character is based on this old movie of his
  • Brie Larson on the ‘Captain Marvel’ smiling controversy — and why it’s so demeaning to women

trail.content_raw:
Captain Marvel invades theaters this weekend, welcoming audiences back to the Marvel Cinematic Universe for the first time since last summer’s Ant-Man and the Wasp. But the first female-fronted Marvel Studios blockbuster isn’t just a theatrical experience. You can bring Captain Marvel, as well as her various friends and foes, home with you via a wealth of Marvel-ous merchandise. Here’s Yahoo Entertainment’s official Captain Marvel shopping guide.

Captain Marvel Bear and Goose

Get stuffed with the latest addition to Build-A-Bear’s line of Marvel-themed stuffed Teddys. The Captain Marvel bear comes in a dashing red, and is accompanied by outfits ranging from her red-and-blue superhero suit to a brown aviator jacket. If you’re more of a cat person than a bear person, pick up Carol’s feline friend, Goose, who comes pre-stuffed.

Shop it: Captain Marvel Bear, $25.50; Goose, $12.50; Captain Marvel Bear Gift Set (w/outfits), $51, Build-A-Bear

Captain Marvel Photon Power FX Glove


You’ll get a real charge out of this stylish glove, which offers all the sounds of Captain Marvel’s photon blasts, with none of their destructive fury. Just imagine how fearsome you’ll be with a the Photon Power glove in one hand, and a Hulk Hand in the other.

Shop it: $15.88, Amazon, Target and Walmart

Her Universe Marvel Captain Marvel Star Girls Faux Leather Jacket and Our Universe Marvel Captain Marvel Womens Windbreaker

Of course, Ashley Eckstein’s geek-friendly fashion line would get in on the Captain Marvel fun! The Clone Wars star modeled her leather jacket version of Carol Danvers’s uniform for us at Comic-Con last year, and now you can bring it home for yourself. If you want something a little lighter than leather, Our Universe’s zip-up windbreaker will leave you floating on air.

Shop it: Leather jacket, $79.90-84.90, Hot Topic; Windbreaker, $58.90, Box Lunch

3 Pair Marvel Comics Captain Marvel Enamel Earring Set

Gals and guys alike will up their pierced-ear game with this set of three different pairs of Captain Marvel-inspired earrings, available in simple starbursts or blazing red medallion. You’ll find these earrings, along with other Captain Marvel merch on Ebay’s Superheroine HQ destination.

Shop it: $12.99 each, Ebay

Captain Marvel Helmet

As the capper to your Captain Marvel ensemble, order one of these custom helmets from the Russian company, LumiMasks. It’s made out of liquid plastic and acrylic paint and fits folks with a 21-inch noggin.

Shop it: $120, Etsy

Captain Marvel: The Art of the Movie and Captain Marvel: Vol. 1

Captain Marvel started as a comic book, so you’ll want to flip through The Art of the Movie‘s copious collection of pre-production concept art that translated the imagery from the page to the screen. And while there have been many (maybe too many) Captain Marvel comics published over the years, you really only need to start with Kelly Sue DeConnick reboot, which placed Carol Danvers in the pilot’s seat as Marvel’s reigning Captain.

Shop it: The Art of the Movie, $39-45, Amazon and Barnes & Noble; Captain Marvel: Vol. 1, $17.99, Amazon and Barnes & Noble

Captain Marvel Comforter and Captain Marvel Reversible Sequin Pillow

Make sure you get a super-sleep with this microfiber comforter, which is a perfect fit for twin beds. And lay your weary head down on a nifty sequin pillow, that can switch from red to blue and back again with a simple wave of your hand.

Shop it: Comforter, $39.95, Shop Disney; Sequin pillow, $19.95, Shop Disney

Nick Fury and Talos 6″ Figures

There’s more to Captain Marvel than Captain Marvel. Samuel L. Jackson scores his most screentime as Nick Fury yet… and he gets to have two eyes this time! Ben Mendelsohn also steals numerous scenes as Talos, the shape-shifting Skrull, who turns out to be anything but your average Marvel bad guy.

Shop it: $19.99, Amazon and Walmart

Captain Marvel Blockbuster Video Pin

How ’90s is Captain Marvel? So ’90s that an entire scene takes place in a Blockbuster Video store. Pledge your allegiance to that decade — and that long-vanished retail giant — with this simple pin. Just be prepared for anyone under the age of 20 to ask you what a VHS tape is.

Shop it: $10, Etsy

Captain Marvel: Higher, Further, Faster

Liza Palmer’s YA novel is brought to life via the power of audiobooks. Learn what life was like for Carol Danvers and her best friend, Monica Rambeau, as Air Force cadets in the early ’80s… before Carol took a trip to the stars.

Shop it: $25.20, Audible

Adidas x Captain Marvel

This Friday 3/8 👟🌟 #HigherFurtherFaster Limited Edition #CaptainMarvel Adidas AM4s designed by me, available exclusively at Foot Locker Flagship Stores & https://t.co/EifShUG9h8. Unisex sizing. International shipping available (with some limitations—please check ahead of time) pic.twitter.com/mb9Lsv5zLi

— Jen Bartel (@heyjenbartel) March 6, 2019

Marvel artist Jen Bartel partnered with Adidas for these awesome red, blue and gold Captain Marvel kicks. These Adidas AM4’s super-stylish, while also making you feel super-heroic.
Shop it: $150, Foot Locker

Dole’s “Powering the Hero Within” Campaign

Even superheroes need healthy food options. That’s the idea behind Dole’s “Powering the Hero Within” campaign, which will splash Captain Marvel’s face across its bananas and pineapples in grocery stores. And if you log onto Dole’s official website, you can find energizing recipes like Wake Up Oats and Berried Treasure Yogurt Cups.
Shop it: Dole

The Fonz Lunchbox

Aaaayyy! It’s truly happy days when Carol is able to keep the all-important Tesseract out of Kree hands by hiding it in her Fonz lunchbox. Play keep away with your own special keepsakes with Entertainment Earth’s reproduction of this vintage tin tote. Or, you know, just stash snacks in it for between-battle nibbles.
Shop it: $14.99, Entertainment Earth

Captain Marvel opens in theaters everywhere March 8. For showtime and ticket information, visit Fandango.


Read more from Yahoo Entertainment:

  • Brie Larson on what it means to be Captain Marvel: ‘I found a level of strength that I didn’t know I had’
  • Samuel L. Jackson thinks de-aged ‘Captain Marvel’ character is based on this old movie of his
  • Brie Larson on the ‘Captain Marvel’ smiling controversy — and why it’s so demeaning to women

Yahoo Entertainment may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

blog.name: andoirs
blog.title: tony stark protection squad
blog.description: sometimes you gotta run before you can walk. faten. xx.

tags: how can you hate something that makes so many young girls happy?
how can you hate something that gives young girls more confidence?
how can you hate a movie that will make young girls feel even better about themselves
i started watching marvel movies when i was 10
and i always wondered why there were so few girls in the movies and why they were treated as sidekicks only
and now i’m 21 (almost) and this movie is coming out and i feel so damn happy
i’m so excited for all the little girls watching this
so if you hate on this movie and call it unnecessary as so many have done
then you are a big asshole
who can’t understand just how important this movie is for young girls/women in general
or you’re just a misogynistic ass
summary: people that hate captain marvel (2019) are weak and won’t survive the winter

summary: Captain Marvel is great. Its steeped in nineties nostalgia in all sorts of ways and in many respects plays like a 90s action...
body:
Captain Marvel is great. Its steeped in nineties nostalgia in all sorts of ways and in many respects plays like a 90s action epic.

It is a ton of fun with a group of actors who’s look like they’re having a great time. Go see it, take your friends, bring the kids.

Also, as my closing argument, I present this, I did not make it but I support it absolutely :
